projects.title: ExpensifyAI - AI Expense Tracker
projects.name: ExpensifyAI - AI Expense Tracker
projects.shortDescription: AI-driven tracker for expense management with automated categorization and role-based sessions.
description: ExpensifyAI is an intelligent expense tracking application that leverages AI algorithms to automatically categorize and manage personal and business expenses. The platform provides role-based access control, allowing different user types to manage their financial data efficiently.
Built with modern web technologies including Next.js, Prisma ORM, and PostgreSQL, the application offers real-time expense tracking, automated categorization, and comprehensive reporting features.
The AI-powered categorization system learns from user behavior and provides increasingly accurate expense classification, reducing manual data entry time by over 50%.
features: AI-powered expense categorization with 50% higher accuracy
Role-based user sessions and access control
Automated data import from various sources
Secure OAuth and social login integration
Responsive design for mobile and desktop
achievements: Automated expense categorization with 50% higher accuracy
Optimized queries and REST APIs, reducing latency by 35%
Enabled multi-user access with OAuth, social logins, and Clerk authentication

projects.title: Naptrix - Smart AI Sleep Tracker
projects.name: Naptrix - Smart AI Sleep Tracker
projects.shortDescription: Modern sleep tracking app with real-time analytics, personalized insights, and beautiful visualizations.
description: Naptrix is a modern sleep tracking web application that helps users record, visualize, and analyze sleep patterns with an intuitive UI and real-time insights.
Built with Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, it features a responsive dashboard, interactive charts, and secure authentication via Clerk.
Data is stored in a Neon PostgreSQL database via Prisma, with Server Actions powering fast, type-safe operations.
features: Sleep duration tracking with add/edit/delete records
Real-time statistics and history with search & filters
Secure authentication with Google/GitHub/Facebook and email
Fully responsive, performant UI with smooth animations
achievements: Delivered a production-ready analytics dashboard with responsive charts
Implemented secure auth and protected routes using Clerk
Set up Neon + Prisma for scalable, serverless Postgres
